auth.description: Discover your musical taste with beautiful 3D visualizations of your top Spotify tracks.

features.topTracks: View your top 30 most played tracks
features.player: Play music directly in your browser

auth.disclaimer: By connecting, you agree to let Latte access your Spotify listening data. We only read your top tracks and basic profile information.
auth.authRequiredMessage: Please log in with your Spotify account to access this feature.
auth.invalidClient: Invalid client configuration. Please check your settings.

timeRange.title: Filter by Time Period
timeRange.description: Explore your music by different time periods

descriptions.short_term: Your top tracks from the past 7 days
descriptions.medium_term: Your top tracks from the past month
descriptions.long_term: Your top tracks from the past 6 months

genre.title: Filter by Genre
genre.description: Explore your music by different genres and categories

stats.title: Your Genre Breakdown
stats.description: Discover your musical preferences across different genres

diversityMessages.high: You have a wonderfully varied taste in music!
diversityMessages.low: Try exploring new genres to increase your diversity!

stats.noGenreData: No genre data available. Listen to more music to see your genre breakdown!

tracks.error: Failed to load tracks. Please try again.

login.title: Welcome to Latte Music
login.description: Discover your musical taste with beautiful 3D visualizations of your top Spotify tracks.
login.disclaimer: By connecting, you agree to let Latte access your Spotify listening data. We only read your top tracks and basic profile information.

hero.title: Discover Your Musical Taste
hero.subtitle: Explore your musical journey with beautiful 3D visualizations of your most played tracks on Spotify.

topTracks.title: Top Tracks
topTracks.description: View and discover your most played tracks with beautiful card layouts.

analytics.title: Music Analytics
analytics.description: Analyze your listening habits and discover your musical taste in detail.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.description: Modern, mobile-friendly design that works perfectly on all devices.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.languageDesc: Choose the language for the application
settings.themeDesc: Choose between light and dark theme
settings.privacyDesc: Manage your data sharing and privacy preferences
settings.friendsDesc: Compare and discover music taste with your friends

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.clearDataDesc: Clear all local data and cache
dangerZone.logoutDesc: Sign out of your account and end all sessions

quiz.title: Music Quiz
quiz.description: Test your music knowledge with your top tracks
quiz.ready: Ready to test your music knowledge?
quiz.instructions: Listen to 5-second snippets of your top tracks and guess the correct song!
quiz.question: Question
quiz.noPreview: No preview available for this track!
quiz.needMoreTracks: Need at least 4 tracks to start the quiz!
quiz.notEnoughTracks: Not enough tracks with preview available for the quiz. You need at least 4 tracks with audio previews.

errors.notEnoughTracks: Not enough tracks available for the quiz.
errors.notEnoughTracksWithPreview: Not enough tracks with preview available for the quiz. You need at least 4 tracks with audio previews.

comparison.title: Music Comparison
comparison.description: Compare your music taste with other users

privacy.allowComparison: Allow others to compare with me

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
